name: Idle Adventure
description: Idle Adventure is a text-based, multi-player online RPG game. Even without astonishing graphics or special effects, it can offer you countless hours of enjoyment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 sp1 Processor: intel Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA TNT2 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 sp1/Windows 10 Processor: intel Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
